TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TtsEventId extends System.Enum

summary.span: 枚举语音合成事件的类型。

span.span: Enumerates types of speech synthesis events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId AudioLevel = int32(9)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎在讲话过程中完成一个音频级别的更改时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes an audio level change while speaking.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId Bookmark = int32(4)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎在讲话过程中遇到一个书签时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a bookmark while speaking.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId EndInputStream = int32(2)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎在讲话过程中遇到它的输入流的末尾时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters the end of its input stream while speaking.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId Phoneme = int32(6)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎在讲话过程中完成一个音素时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a phoneme while speaking.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId SentenceBoundary = int32(7)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎在讲话过程中完成一个句子时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a sentence while speaking.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId StartInputStream = int32(1)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎开始讲话时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine a begins speaking a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId Viseme = int32(8)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎在讲话过程中完成一个 viseme 时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a viseme while speaking.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId VoiceChange = int32(3)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎在讲话过程中遇到一个语音更改时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a change of Voice while speaking.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId WordBoundary = int32(5)

summary.span: 当语音合成引擎在讲话过程中完成一个词语时，标识生成的事件。

span.span: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a word while speaking.
